title: How to Be Popular
description:
Do you want to be popular Everyone wants to be popular-but Steph Landry wants it more than most. Steph's been the least popular girl in class ever since she spilt red Super Big Gulp over Lauren Moffat's white D&G miniskirt five years ago. Does being popular matters? It matters very much - to Steph. That's why this year she's got a plan to get in with the It Crowd in no time flat. Her secret weapon: ab old book called - what else? - How to be Popular. 
But don't forget the most important thing about popularity!
 It's easy to become popular. It's a lot less easy staying that way.
author: Meg Cabot
